main.name: Sam Kautz
main.description: I'm trained in and enjoy working with React, C#, Python, SQL, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Node, Bootstrap, and more!
main.bio: Welcome to my resume website! I built this site using React, Jquery, HTML5, Bootstrap4, CSS3, Node, and a few API's. I enjoy working with all of these languages and am exploring new languages all the time. Keep reading to find a little more information about me and my work!
main.contactmessage: Use this contact form to reach out and I will get back to you as soon as possible!

education.degree: B.A. in Business with a minor in Finance.

work.title: Associate Agent
work.description: Assist clients with questions regarding home purchases, home sales, and general questions regarding the real estate market.

work.title: Retirement Team Lead
work.description: At GuideLink I worked with cleints by providing investment and or retirement guidance, initiated buys and sells on behalf of clients, and provided other general retirement advice regarding 403(b) retirement accounts.

projects.title: React Website

testimonials.text: Sam did a great job building a wesbite for our small business! We have already had a few messages and calls from the new site and love the clean look. We would highly recommend his work.
